comment.author: 9743588@N08
comment._content: Never give up.  You can survive in any situation given the will.

comment.author: 8822983@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Katoomba, and we'd love to have this added to the group! I believe this is Nellies Glen, named after Ellen North (b.1862), daughter of John Britty North, owner of the coal and oil shale mines in Katoomba. Other early names from 1882 include Nelly's Glen and Megalong Cleft.

comment.author: 47500696@N02
comment._content: This is looking down the Western Side of Orphan Rock Katoomba. The miners huts can be seen in the bottom of the valley for the Katoomba Coal Mine.
